title: Bitcoin plummets below $90,000 as AI future worries investors
description: Concerns over leverage in the system, talk of a possible new crypto winter and underperformance versus equities all weighed on valuations and activity

title: OpenAI launches GPT-5.2 AI model with improved capabilities
description: Dec 11 (Reuters) - OpenAI on Thursday launched its GPT-5.2 artificial intelligence model, after CEO Sam Altman reportedly issued an internal "code red" in early December pausing non‐core projects and

title: TIME magazine names 'The Architects of AI' as 2025 Person of the Year, confirming leak to betting markets
description: The magazine cites the tremendous technological advances made by the artificial intelligence industry over the past year in bringing on the age of "thinking machines".

title: Fort Worth Enhances Emergency Communications with New AI System to Triage Non-Emergency Calls
description: Fort Worth introduces an AI system to handle non-emergency calls, aiming to improve response times and public safety services.

title: OpenAI aims to silence concerns it is falling behind in the AI race with release of new model GPT-5.2
description: OpenAI said its new model outperforms those from rivals Google and Anthropic across a wide range of evaluations.
